item.title: Getting started with ansible-playbook
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting ansible-playbook set up or installed. ansible-playbook runs playbook # It is a powerful and mostly used keyword in Ansible to run Playbook using Ad-Hoc commands Example: ansible-playbook demo.yml Further Reading on ansible-plabook
